All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CommandCooldownPopup
 
CommandRestrictionPopup
 
commands
The commands class represents the GUI for managing pet care actions in the game.
Game
Represents the game logic for a pet simulation game.
GameSaveData
GameSaveData encapsulates all data that needs to be saved when the game is saved.
Inventory
The Inventory class represents the player's inventory, containing items, a current pet, locked pets, and the player's score.
InventoryGUI
InventoryGUI is a graphical user interface (GUI) that allows users to interact with the inventory system.
Item
The Item class represents an item in the player's inventory.
LowStatWarning
This Class is responsible for displaying a stylish warning dialog when a pet's stat is low.
Main_Menu
Main_Menu - Responsive Java Swing GUI main menu with centered, styled components.
mainGame
The mainGame class represents the main gameplay window for the pet simulation game.
ParentalControls
ParentalControls - Password screen followed by controls/settings screen.
Pet
The Pet class represents a virtual pet with various attributes such as health, happiness, hunger, and sleep.
PetSelection
The PetSelection class provides a graphical interface for selecting a pet in the Virtual Pet Application.
settings
Settings dialog that provides options to resume game, save game, return to main menu, or exit the application.
StyledDialog
The StyledDialog class provides a modernized custom dialog with enhanced visual styling.
StyledSaveSelector
The StyledSaveSelector class provides a stylish dialog for selecting saved games.
TutorialScreen
The TutorialScreen class provides a multi-page tutorial walkthrough for the Virtual Pet Application.
UserInterface
The UserInterface class serves as the main entry point for the Virtual Pet Application.
